title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.7 - First aid and protective equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 256.7 - First aid and protective equipment

State Regulations

All waterless holders shall have as a minimum the following
items of equipment readily accessible at the specified locations: (a) Two pieces of self-contained oxygen
breathing apparatus of a manufacture approved by the United States Bureau of

Mines located as follows: one on upper platform or balcony; one on
piston. (b) Four fire-proofed
woolen blankets located as follows: two on upper platform or balcony; two on
piston. (c) A sufficient number of
extra oxygen cylinders shall be readily available on the holder or adjacent
thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
256.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
